sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT SYS_CHANGE_VERSION FROM ChangeTracking_Fabric_Update WHERE TableName = 'tbl_job_items'

SELECT DISTINCT 
		ISNULL(MAX(CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION),0) AS SYS_CHANGE_VERSION	   
FROM CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [DBO].[tbl_job_items],0) CT
LEFT JOIN [DBO].[tbl_job_items] F
 ON CT.[JobItemId] = F.[JobItemId]
WHERE ISNULL(CT.[SYS_CHANGE_VERSION],'') > ''

SELECT  CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION
	   ,CT.SYS_CHANGE_CREATION_VERSION
	   ,CT.SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION
	   ,CT.SYS_CHANGE_COLUMNS
	   ,CT.SYS_CHANGE_CONTEXT
	   ,CT.[JobItemId] AS CT_JobItemId
      ,F.[JobItemId]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([JobStageId],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [JobStageId]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([PriceMatrixItemId],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [PriceMatrixItemId]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([PriceMatrixMultiplierId],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [PriceMatrixMultiplierId]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([JobItemStatus],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [JobItemStatus]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([JobItemDescription],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [JobItemDescription]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([JobItemAlias],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [JobItemAlias]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([Quantity],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [Quantity]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([Cost],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [Cost]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([PlateType],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [PlateType]
      ,[ItemDueDateTime]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([ItemDueReason],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [ItemDueReason]
      ,[ItemBookedDateTime]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([ItemKPI],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [ItemKPI]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([ItemKPIDuration],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [ItemKPIDuration]
      ,[ItemCompletedDateTime]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([TargetDeadline],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [TargetDeadline]
      ,[TargetDeadlineDate]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([CurrencyId],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [CurrencyId]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([ExchangeRateValue],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [ExchangeRateValue]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([CurrencyCost],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [CurrencyCost]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([PriceMatrixItemSalesTaxCode],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [PriceMatrixItemSalesTaxCode]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([PriceMatrixItemSalesTaxExempt],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [PriceMatrixItemSalesTaxExempt]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([OriginalJobItemId],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [OriginalJobItemId]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([AccountManagerLoginId],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [AccountManagerLoginId]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([AssignedTo],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [AssignedTo]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([PriceMatrixVariantItemId],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [PriceMatrixVariantItemId]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([ItemOrder],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [ItemOrder]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([WorkflowTemplateItemId],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [WorkflowTemplateItemId]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([CreatedByInvoiceId],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [CreatedByInvoiceId]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([POLineNumber],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [POLineNumber]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([CreatedBy],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [CreatedBy]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([UpdatedBy],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [UpdatedBy]
      ,[UpdatedDateTime]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([ItemComplexity],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [ItemComplexity]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([DimensionComments],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [DimensionComments]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([PatchConfirmationLoginId],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [PatchConfirmationLoginId]
      ,[PatchConfirmationLoginDate]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([DimensionsLocked],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [DimensionsLocked]
  FROM CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [DBO].[tbl_job_items],@{activity('LookupOld').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) CT
  LEFT JOIN [DBO].[tbl_job_items] F 
ON F.[JobItemId] = CT.[JobItemId]
 WHERE ISNULL(CT.[SYS_CHANGE_VERSION],'') > ''
  AND ISNULL(CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION,0) <= @{activity('LookupNew').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}

SELECT  CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION
	   ,CT.SYS_CHANGE_CREATION_VERSION
	   ,CT.SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION
	   ,CT.SYS_CHANGE_COLUMNS
	   ,CT.SYS_CHANGE_CONTEXT
	   ,CT.[JobItemId] AS CT_JobItemId
      ,F.[JobItemId]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([JobStageId],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [JobStageId]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([PriceMatrixItemId],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [PriceMatrixItemId]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([PriceMatrixMultiplierId],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [PriceMatrixMultiplierId]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([JobItemStatus],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [JobItemStatus]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([JobItemDescription],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [JobItemDescription]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([JobItemAlias],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [JobItemAlias]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([Quantity],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [Quantity]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([Cost],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [Cost]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([PlateType],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [PlateType]
      ,[ItemDueDateTime]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([ItemDueReason],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [ItemDueReason]
      ,[ItemBookedDateTime]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([ItemKPI],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [ItemKPI]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([ItemKPIDuration],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [ItemKPIDuration]
      ,[ItemCompletedDateTime]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([TargetDeadline],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [TargetDeadline]
      ,[TargetDeadlineDate]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([CurrencyId],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [CurrencyId]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([ExchangeRateValue],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [ExchangeRateValue]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([CurrencyCost],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [CurrencyCost]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([PriceMatrixItemSalesTaxCode],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [PriceMatrixItemSalesTaxCode]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([PriceMatrixItemSalesTaxExempt],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [PriceMatrixItemSalesTaxExempt]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([OriginalJobItemId],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [OriginalJobItemId]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([AccountManagerLoginId],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [AccountManagerLoginId]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([AssignedTo],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [AssignedTo]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([PriceMatrixVariantItemId],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [PriceMatrixVariantItemId]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([ItemOrder],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [ItemOrder]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([WorkflowTemplateItemId],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [WorkflowTemplateItemId]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([CreatedByInvoiceId],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [CreatedByInvoiceId]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([POLineNumber],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [POLineNumber]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([CreatedBy],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [CreatedBy]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([UpdatedBy],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [UpdatedBy]
      ,[UpdatedDateTime]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([ItemComplexity],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [ItemComplexity]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([DimensionComments],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [DimensionComments]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([PatchConfirmationLoginId],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [PatchConfirmationLoginId]
      ,[PatchConfirmationLoginDate]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([DimensionsLocked],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [DimensionsLocked]
  FROM CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [DBO].[tbl_job_items],@{activity('LookupOld').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) CT
  LEFT JOIN [DBO].[tbl_job_items] F 
ON F.[JobItemId] = CT.[JobItemId]
 WHERE ISNULL(CT.[SYS_CHANGE_VERSION],'') > ''
  AND ISNULL(CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION,0) <= @{activity('LookupNew').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}
